nodes.text: A platoon of stormtroopers and scout troopers were part of a battalion led by Moff Gideon when on Nevarro. During the skirmish on Nevarro around 9 ABY, after the main fighting in the city concluded, the platoon positioned themselves outside the mouth of a lava river. The platoon was wiped out when IG-11 sacrificed itself in an explosion.
The platoon first appeared in "Chapter 8: Redemption" and was confirmed to be a platoon by the episode's descriptive audio.
